title: Five-Star Luxury on the Water’s Edge
description: Holiday like European royalty with a five-star getaway to the spectacular Regent Porto Montenegro, on the glittering coast of the Adriatic. Spend three nights in sheer luxury while enjoying daily American buffet breakfast, an EUR10 spa credit and an EUR10 restaurant credit, a refreshing drink on arrival and a welcome gift. Travel through to March 2019 and receive an automatic upgrade to a stunning Sea View Room.
offer_address: Porto Montenegro Village, 85320 Tivat, Montenegro Tivat

title: Stylish Five-Star Escape to Montenegro with Chic Beach Club
description: Embrace the beauty of Montenegro with a stay at the five-star La Perla Hotel & Villas in the coastal town of Tivat. Located in the tranquil Bay of Kotor, you’ll have easy access to Our Lady of the Rocks and Island of Flowers. Included in your package is daily breakfast, a welcome drink and bottle of wine on arrival, EUR40 dinner credit and EUR20 per person to use towards the brand-new on-site spa.

title: Five-Star Montenegro Oceanfront Luxury
description:
Discover one of Europe's best-kept secrets with an ultra-luxe escape at Nikki Beach Hotel & Spa Montenegro, a stylish five-star oceanfront retreat crowning the sparkling Bay of Tivat. Newly opened in 2021, this stunning sanctuary features a glorious palm-fringed infinity pool that flows into sparkling sea vistas and exclusive access to a golden stretch of private beach. Its boutique collection of elegantly designed rooms and suites guarantee you'll be right at home, even when you're miles away from everyday life.

Tucked beneath the ever-popular coastline of Croatia, Montenegro is the Adriatic gem that proves good things come in small packages. Stroll the narrow cobblestone streets of enchanting coastal towns Budva and Kotor, get your heart pumping with adrenaline-inducing activities and watersports across the country's five National Parks, or sit back and relax on some of Europe's most beautiful beaches, lapped by warm Mediterranean waters - all complemented by an average of over 240 days of sunshine a year.

title: Five-Star Montenegro Waterfront Retreat with Venetian Renaissance-Inspired Architecture
description: Strike the perfect balance between coastal charm and upscale elegance at Regent Porto Montenegro, an IHG Hotel, stretched along the shores of Boka Bay. Luxurious in every sense of the word, the Regent pays homage to Montenegro’s Venetian ties, with a Murano glass chandelier in the lobby and swimming pool overlooking the marina. Inside, tranquil rooms offer ocean or mountain vistas, five dining venues serve the freshest cuisine, and renewing treatments are on offer at the lavish spa.
location_description: Regent Porto Montenegro, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Obala bb, Porto Montenegro, Tivat 85320, Montenegro
